charges.charge_description: Theft from Federal Firearms Licensed Business. Penalty: 10 yrs, $250,000.00 fine; $100.00 CVF; Not more than 3 yrs TSR.(2)

charges.charge_disposition: 46 mos to serve; 3 yrs srt, comply with all standard and mandatory conditions imposed; DNA sample; not possess any firearms or destructive devices; $100 s/a; $1,000 fine to be paid immediately; Restitution in the amount of $12,850 to be paid immediately w/codeft to Kirpatrick Guns and Ammo payable to Michael J. Kirpatrick; drug/alcohol treatment in/out patient, deft to incur cost based on ability to pay; drug treatment at BOP; mental health program deft to incur cost based on ability to pay; Educ/GED; placement at Three Rivers; advised of 14 days to appeal
